name: scurrility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of expressing unfair or false criticism that is likely to damage someone's reputation: His article is a blend of scholarship and scurrility. He thinks he can add weight to his arguments by scurrility and abuse.
More examplesFewer examplesThe volume of scurrility we have today with all of the media outlets is sometimes quite overwhelming.Their scurrility would not be tolerated in a modern newspaper.His weekly newspaper column is full of political leaks, gossip and, sometimes, scurrility.
